meanings.definition: The act of elaborating excessively or in unnecessary detail.
meanings.sent1: Her overelaboration on the project made it confusing for everyone.
meanings.sent2: The overelaboration of the plan caused delays in its implementation.
meanings.sent3: His overelaboration on how to make a sandwich was both amusing and unnecessary.
meanings.sent4: The overelaboration of her outfit made her stand out in a sea of simplicity.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's overelaboration on the topic made it hard for the students to follow.

meanings.definition: The state of being overly elaborate or detailed.
meanings.sent1: The overelaboration in her speech made it hard to understand her main point.
meanings.sent2: His overelaboration in decorating the room made it look cluttered.
meanings.sent3: The overelaboration of the cake decorations was so excessive that it collapsed under its own weight.
meanings.sent4: The overelaboration of the garden design turned the backyard into a magical wonderland.
meanings.sent5: The overelaboration of the rules made the game less enjoyable for everyone.
